results.p: Who is Hulk? toggle section. Hulk is the identity shared with Doctor Robert Bruce Banner, a superhero and member of the Avengers. Banner is a renowned scientist ...
Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers a lab accident that makes him transform into a raging, giant green monster when angered, ...
Dr. Robert Bruce Banner, Ph.D. a.k.a. the Hulk, is an American theoretical physicist, famed for his work in the fields of nuclear physics and gamma radiation.
Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.Bruce Banner, a ...
Scientist Bruce Banner (Edward Norton) desperately seeks a cure for the gamma radiation that contaminated his cells and turned him into The Hulk.
